connectMXBeanSensors

@Nullable
public static JmxFeed connectMXBeanSensors(EntityLocal entity, Duration jmxPollPeriod)
Parameters:
entity - The entity at which to poll
jmxPollPeriod - How often to poll
Returns:
A JmxFeed configured to poll the given entity at the given period, or null if the entity is not configured for MXBEAN_STATS
See Also:
UsesJavaMXBeans.MXBEAN_STATS_ENABLED

getMxBeanSensorsBuilder

public static Builder getMxBeanSensorsBuilder(EntityLocal entity)
Parameters:
entity - The entity at which to poll
Returns:
A JmxFeed.Builder configured to poll entity every ten seconds
See Also:

public static Builder getMxBeanSensorsBuilder(EntityLocal entity, long jmxPollPeriod)
See Also:
getMxBeanSensorsBuilder(EntityLocal, Duration)

getMxBeanSensorsBuilder

@Nonnull
@SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
public static Builder getMxBeanSensorsBuilder(EntityLocal entity, Duration jmxPollPeriod)
Parameters:
entity - The entity at which to poll
jmxPollPeriod - How often to poll
Returns:
A JmxFeed.Builder configured to poll many interesting MXBeans at the given entity and to repeat according to the given poll period.

If an entity does not have MXBean stats enabled (i.e. UsesJavaMXBeans#MXBEAN_STATS_ENABLED#MXBEAN_STATS_ENABLED is configured to false) then returns a builder configured with entity and duration but no polls.

Use connectMXBeanSensors(EntityLocal, Duration) to create and build in one step.
